chapters.title: Chapter 22: Watchers
chapters.info: Myrelle Berengari, p. 323 (285)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She currently has three Warders, and treats each of them as a husband. She was selected by Moiraine as the one Moiraine would pass Lan's bond to in the event that she died before he did. She agrees to keep Lan only as long as necessary, before another Aes Sedai can be found to pass Lan's bond to. See also Mandragoran, Lan.
